properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 2:50AM EST until February 20 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft expected. For the
Gale Watch, north winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 7 to 12 ft possible.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 2 PM EST Thursday.
For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
